channel.title: whonix 14.0.0.7.4 only black screen
channel.description: Hello, I have a problem when I want to turn on the whonix gateway, only the black screen with the cursor appears and on this black background Anon Connection Wizard appears and then the Whonix Setup Wizard, then whonicheck. When the closed whonix check background is still black and you can see only the cursor I can not click anything because there is nothing. Please help.

item.title: whonix 14.0.0.7.4 only black screen
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
josuha:

This new whonix looks very spectacular and colorful, which eats away a lot of RAM. I think that it is worth thinking about some light environment without unnecessary improvements, because most whonix users do not care about it.

In the works.

  • User Poll - XFCE vs KDE - KDE Deprecation Considered!
  • Whonix XFCE testers-only version available - see https://forums.whonix.org/c/news
Whonix

Stay Tuned

Stay up-to-date on the latest Whonix news

Read full topic

item.title: whonix 14.0.0.7.4 only black screen
item.dc:creator: josuha
item.description:
Thanks for quick reply. Yes, the problem was on the gateway and workstation. Whonix version 14, virtualbox version 5.2.2 I managed to solve the problem by changing the view option to scaled.
It cost me several times to reinstall whonix, virtual machine and operating system, and a few hours;)
Problem solved but this error is still there. This new whonix looks very spectacular and colorful, which eats away a lot of RAM. I think that it is worth thinking about some light environment without unnecessary improvements, because most whonix users do not care about it. sorry for my bad English.
greetings

Read full topic

item.title: whonix 14.0.0.7.4 only black screen
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi josuha

Could you provide more info.

  • Is this a fresh install of Whonix?
  • Is Whonix-Workstation functional?
  • What hypervisor are you using?
  • Does this happen when you create a Debian virtual machine?

Edit by Patrick:

See https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/Troubleshooting#Black_Screen

Read full topic

item.title: whonix 14.0.0.7.4 only black screen
item.dc:creator: josuha
item.description:
Hello, I have a problem when I want to turn on the whonix gateway, only the black screen with the cursor appears and on this black background Anon Connection Wizard appears and then the Whonix Setup Wizard, then whonicheck. When the closed whonix check background is still black and you can see only the cursor I can not click anything because there is nothing. Please help.
